title: Problem solving strategies the synectics approach
brief_description: Everyone has great creative potential but most of us do not use this because we are afraid of making mistakes. Certain strategies have been developed at Synthetics to overcome self-censoring. In the film we see some strategies in action during a Problem Solving Laboratory session.
